By GM on Thursday, July 19, 2007 - 10:07 am:

http://www.mf-online.jp/nt_report.aspx

The official site has some sort of data report in regards to the
server tests. A few charts and statistics, and maybe polls.

What's the jist of it, Lisa?

By Lisa Shock on Thursday, July 19, 2007 - 09:23 pm:

It's about a questionnaire they asked us to fill out. The charts show people's responses to questions about the monsters, the interface, etc.

More later if I have time.

By Lisa Shock on Friday, July 20, 2007 - 08:51 am:
